sense.def:
To be confronted with a problem or task
pomeni spopasti se z neko težavo ali nalogo.

seg.quote: ...typical problems that confront Germans learning English.

sense.def:
To confront an enemy
pomeni srečati sovražnika iz oči v oči.

seg.quote: They were confronted by a line of guardsmen.

sense.def:
To confront someone with facts or evidence
pomeni nekomu predstaviti dejstva ali dokaze, zato da bi ga nečesa obtožili.

seg.quote: I decided to confront her with the charges of racism.
